results.name: Number of parts in all partitions of n with largest multiplicity two.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..5000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, [1, 0], `if`(i<1, 0,
mathematica: a /@ Range[2, 60] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 13 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 11 2018
